meanings.definition: Offensive slang term for black people.
meanings.sent1: Some people use the word schvartzes to insult others.
meanings.sent2: The schvartzes in the neighborhood organized a community event.
meanings.sent3: During the argument, he ignorantly called him a schvartzes.
meanings.sent4: The darkness of the night enveloped the city like a cloak of schvartzes.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained the history behind the term schvartzes to the students.

meanings.sent1: At the party, there were many schvartzes enjoying the music.
meanings.sent2: The schvartzes in the photograph looked happy and proud.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled when they saw a group of schvartzes dancing.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered, casting the land in shadows of schvartzes.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a beautiful portrait of a family of schvartzes.

meanings.definition: Used as a derogatory term for a person of African descent.
meanings.sent1: It is hurtful to hear someone use the word schvartzes in a conversation.
meanings.sent2: The use of schvartzes to describe someone is unacceptable.
meanings.sent3: He thought it was funny to refer to his friend as a schvartzes.
meanings.sent4: The shadows of the past loomed over the town like whispers of schvartzes.
meanings.sent5: The news anchor condemned the use of the term schvartzes on live television.
